snippet: The Vikings’ 2,000-yard man Adrian Peterson and the Texans’ defensive end J. J. Watt were unanimous choices for The Associated Press All-Pro team, which was announced Saturday.
abstract: Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson and Houston Texans defensive end J J Watt are unanimous choices for the Associated Press All-Pro team; other football developments noted.
lead_paragraph: The Vikings’ 2,000-yard man Adrian Peterson and the Texans’ defensive end J. J. Watt were unanimous choices for The Associated Press All-Pro team, which was announced Saturday.

headline.main: Peterson and Watt Chosen Unanimously as All-Pros
headline.print_headline: Peterson and Watt Chosen Unanimously as All-Pros
